Question
========

The average and standard deviation are statistics that are particularly 
useful for describing characteristics of the frequency distributions of:

Answerlist
----------

* categorical variables
* indicator variables
* quantitative variables

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* * categorical variables: Incorrect
* indicator variables: Incorrect
* quantitative variables: Correct
